pn:item.pn:title: Usability question: Toggle between edit and view mode makes sense?
pn:item.pn:description: ProcessPuzzle follows the "Edit in-place if you're authorized." usability rule. There is no administrative UI, special UI for content management or workflow specification. Consequently if you add a link to a TextElement of SmartDocument this link will work. This behavior seems to be logical, in the other hand clicking on link can navigate the user to another site. Can this harm the user? Does it makes sense to provide view and edit mode? (supposed the user is authorized)
